```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(hms)
library(magrittr)
library(plotly)
library(shiny)

work_1_morn = read_csv('/home/rstudio/commuteR/work_1_morn.csv', col_names = c('dtg','sec'))
work_2_morn = read_csv('/home/rstudio/commuteR/work_2_morn.csv', col_names = c('dtg','sec'))
work_1_after = read_csv('/home/rstudio/commuteR/work_1_after.csv', col_names = c('dtg','sec'))
work_2_after = read_csv('/home/rstudio/commuteR/work_2_after.csv', col_names = c('dtg','sec'))

work_1_morn %<>%
  mutate(dtg_conv = lubridate::with_tz(as_datetime(dtg), tzone = "America/Monterrey"),
         dtg_rnd = lubridate::round_date(dtg_conv, unit = "5 mins"),
         time = hms::as_hms(dtg_rnd),
         date = lubridate::as_date(dtg_rnd),
         min = sec/60,
         dow = c("Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", 
        "Friday", "Saturday")[as.POSIXlt(date)$wday + 1])

work_2_morn %<>%
  mutate(dtg_conv = lubridate::with_tz(as_datetime(dtg), tzone = "America/Monterrey"),
         dtg_rnd = lubridate::round_date(dtg_conv, unit = "5 mins"),
         time = hms::as_hms(dtg_rnd),
         date = lubridate::as_date(dtg_rnd),
         min = sec/60,
         dow = c("Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", 
    "Friday", "Saturday")[as.POSIXlt(date)$wday + 1])

work_1_after %<>%
  mutate(dtg_conv = lubridate::with_tz(as_datetime(dtg), tzone = "America/Monterrey"),
         dtg_rnd = lubridate::round_date(dtg_conv, unit = "5 mins"),
         time = hms::as_hms(dtg_rnd),
         date = lubridate::as_date(dtg_rnd),
         min = sec/60,
         dow = c("Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", 
    "Friday", "Saturday")[as.POSIXlt(date)$wday + 1])
work_2_after %<>%
  mutate(dtg_conv = lubridate::with_tz(as_datetime(dtg), tzone = "America/Monterrey"),
         dtg_rnd = lubridate::round_date(dtg_conv, unit = "5 mins"),
         time = hms::as_hms(dtg_rnd),
         date = lubridate::as_date(dtg_rnd),
         min = sec/60,
         dow = c("Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", 
    "Friday", "Saturday")[as.POSIXlt(date)$wday + 1])


```

### Round Rock

#### To Work
```{r}
renderPlotly({
  work_2_morn %>%
    mutate(dow_select = as.character(input$day_of_week), name = "dow_select") %>%
    mutate(dow_select = ifelse(dow_select == "Work Week", 
                               c("Monday", 
                                 "Tuesday", 
                                 "Wednesday", 
                                 "Thursday", 
                                 "Friday"), 
                               dow_select)) %>%
    filter(dow %in% dow_select) %>%
    group_by(time) %>%
    arrange(time) %>%
    mutate(avg_min = round(mean(min),2)) %>%
    plot_ly(x = ~time, 
            y = ~avg_min, 
            type = "scatter", 
            text = ~paste("Time: ", time, '<br>Avg Time:', avg_min),
            color = ~avg_min,
            marker = list(colorscale = "Bluered")
    ) %>%
    hide_colorbar() %>%
    layout(showLegend = FALSE, 
           showScale = FALSE,
           xaxis = list(title = ""),
           yaxis = list(title = "Average Commute Time"))
})
```
